body: Tbh, only monsters in h-manga that are typically doing stupid shit like delivering pleasure to their prey... unnecessarily but that's hentai for ya and they serve that purpose for such kind of freaky fetish(es). @Feuerteufel: it's fine that you never understand such things (me too!), at least you are a step closer to a clearer sanity than those freaks, no offense intended but it's true.
I will never understand the fascination many people have with fantasy worlds, as they're most oftenly home to such gruesome monsters like the one portrait in this ero-manga.
